'''Trail of Subjugated Saurians''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Coatepec Mountain]], [[Natlan]]. Discover the [[Phlogiston Extraction Research Center]] and deactivate it by following the trail of [[Fatui]] and their [[Saurian]] prisoners.

==Steps==
# Enter the Phlogiston Extraction Research Center, located underground, accessed from a crevice guarded by [[Fatui Skirmisher]]s northeast of [[Ancestral Temple]], [[Coatepec Mountain]].
# Defeat the Fatui at the base, i.e. at the entrance of map level ''Extraction Research Center: Experimental Site''<!--
-->{{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer;Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire}}
# Open the Common Chest to obtain {{Item|Key With Frontal Notches|x=1}}
# Use the key to unlock the nearby [[Saurian Cart]]
#* This will create [[Yumkasaurus]] [[Saurian Indwelling#Spiritsconces|Spiritsconces]] along the path to the locked gate
# Use the [[Relay Ball|Replica "Relay Ball"]] to unlock the gate
# Proceed into the control room and enter the eastern room
# Catch the burrowing [[Tepetlisaur Whelp]]
#* A [[Removable Grappling Hook]] and a [[Tepetlisaurus]] Spiritsconce will appear
# Remove the grappling hook and attach it to the metal crate
# Grab and pull the metal crate twice to bring it to the room's entrance
# Remove the Replica "Relay Ball" and return to the control room
# Insert the Replica "Relay Ball" into one of the metal platforms
#* The southern room's gate will open and the following enemies will appear:<!--
-->{{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard*2}}
# Enter the southern room and grab the second Replica "Relay Ball" from inside the hanging cage above, with the help of the [[Special Coilgrass Sigil]]
# Return to the control room and place the second Replica "Relay Ball" into the other metal platform
# Disable the machine (requires pressing "Disable" twice)
# Hold out against the Fatui for 60 seconds
#* The first two enemies will appear from the following list, and with each enemy defeated, subsequent enemies will keep replacing them in the given order, cycling until the timer runs out<!--
-->{{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer;Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Geochanter Bracer;Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire}}
# Defeat the {{Enemy|Fatui Pyro Agent|text=Veteran Fatui Pyro Agent}}
#* An ally {{Enemy|Yumkasaurus}} and {{Enemy|Tepetlisaurus}} will fight alongside the player until the Veteran Fatui Pyro Agent is defeated

==Gameplay Notes==
* Completing step 15 (holding out against the Fatui for 60 seconds) grants the {{Achievement|Righteous Resistance}}.
* Completing the quest (defeating the Veteran Fatui Pyro Agent) grants a Luxurious Chest containing {{Item|Key With Rear Notches|x=1}} and {{Item|Shattered Night Jade|x=1}}.
* After defeating the Veteran Fatui Pyro Agent, the Saurians will be freed and can no longer be interacted with.
* The following chests are unlocked in the process of this Hidden Exploration Objective, but are not needed to unlock its related Achievement or the final Luxurious Chest:
** Unlocking the second Saurian Cart in the control room using the {{Item|Key With Centered Notches}} reveals a Precious Chest.
** Riding the newly unlocked [[Spiritway]] in the southern room grants an Exquisite Chest after reaching the end.
